articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Hwa Islet Defence Detachment of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Hwa Islet Defence Detachment of KPA
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, inspected the Hwa Islet Defence Detachment standing guard over a forward post off the East Coast of Korea.
					 He first went round the monument to the field guidance given by leader Kim Jong Il erected to hand down forever the immortal exploits he performed by inspecting the islet defence detachment in October 1999.
					
					 Recalling that President Kim Il Sung gave dozens of precious instructions as regards the islet defence detachment and Kim Jong Il always paid deep attention to it, Kim Jong Un underscored the need to glorify their exploits performed in commanding the army with the shining achievements in rounding off the combat preparations and bolstering up combat capabilities.
					
					 Watching the woodland on the islet and fruit trees of various species around the barracks, he said: "The islet is full of trees. It's better to call the islet Song Islet instead of Hwa Islet as pine trees have formed thick verdure". He highly praised the detachment for having turned the islet into a thick woodland and greenery and orchard as intended by the party.
					
					 Then he mounted the observation post and heard a report on the combat mission of the defense detachment from the commanding officers, examining in detail the defense plan of the detachment.
					
					 Underscoring the need to wipe out the enemies coming in attack from the sea to the last man, he indicated new and unique war methods to be applied by the Hwa Islet Defence Detachment for rounding off its combat readiness such as the deployment of strike means and the effective use of the firing positions as required by the modern warfare. 
					
					 "The Hwa Islet Defence Detachment is an advance base in the defence theatre of KPA Large Combined Unit 324 and an outpost in the East Sea guarding the gateway to the Party Central Committee," he noted, adding: "It is an important task of the defence detachment to turn the islet into an impregnable fortress, unsinkable warship and the present-day Wolmi island."
					
					 He instructed the commanding officers to intensify the politico-ideological education among the service personnel to train them as phoenixes, underlining the need to make military training, in particular, part of their life and habit and thus build a-match-for-a hundred combat capabilities so that they may send all the enemies intruding into the territorial waters of the DPRK to the bottom of the sea once a battle starts. 
					
					 He gave the defence detachment an order to conduct a sudden artillery firing and guided the drill.
					
					 He issued an order to open fire, watching with deep attention the artillery men in firepower service through a pair of binoculars.
					
					 The artillery pieces roared and shells accurately hit the targets.
					
					 His face beaming with a broad smile, he said: "They are very good at firing. All of them are crack shots and the commander of the defence detachment has successfully commanded the firing".
					
					 He said that the artillery men could hit all targets as they have undergone intensive training, bearing deep in mind the call of the party for waging a dynamic movement for becoming crack shots. He named the Fifth Company of the defence detachment which conducted the firing drill "Crack Shots Company" and extended the thanks of the KPA supreme commander to it.
					
					 He went round the soldiers' bed room, room for education, wash-cum-bath room, mess hall and stores of the Third Company of the defence detachment to take warm care of their living.
					
					 He said that it is very gratifying to hear that the defence detachment serves every service person with more than 360g of soy-based food every day and each mess hall of the companies is providing the service personnel with fish and with sumptuous meals by raising lots of domestic animals such as pigs, ducks and geese.
					
					 He noted that the companies of the defence detachment are like homes dear to the soldiers and the detachment is like their native village as it provides them with sumptuous meals and warm beds.
					
					 Praising the Hwa Islet Defence Detachment for most thoroughly carrying out the party's military  policy like the Ryo Islet Defence Detachment, he called on it to make a high-pitched drive for developing stockbreeding, fishery and soybean farming to turn itself into a more  proud and richer detachment in the future.
					
					 He gave a pair of binoculars and an automatic rifle to the Third Company as gifts before having a photo taken with the service personnel of the Hwa Islet Defence Detachment and their families, expressing expectation and belief that the service personnel would remain true to the party's Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and Army Col. Gen. Pak Jong Chon, vice-chief of the KPA General Staff.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Burundi
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Burundi
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Pierre Nkurunziza, president of Burundi, on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily grow strong.
					
					 It wished the president and the people of Burundi greater success in the work for peace, stability and economic prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Rwanda
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Rwanda
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to  Paul Kagame, president of Rwanda, on the occasion of the national holiday of the Rwandan people.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations developing on good terms between the two countries would grow stronger day by day, wishing the president and people of Rwanda greater success in the work for peace, stability and economic prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets Finnish PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets Finnish PM
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Aleksander Stubb upon his appointment as prime minister of Finland. 
					 The message wished the prime minister successes in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country and welfare of its people.

articles.title: Revolutionary Feats Will Be Immortal: Foreign Political Party Leaders
articles.content:
Revolutionary Feats Will Be Immortal: Foreign Political Party Leaders
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Leaders of political parties of different countries in their congratulatory messages and letters highly praised President Kim Il Sung as the invincible and iron-willed commander, great revolutionary and outstanding leader.
					 The chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-《Kyrgyz El》Republican Political Party said that the President is the distinguished political activist and genius of ideology, theory of leadership.
					
					 The secretary of the Central Committee of the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks noted that the President aroused the Korean people to oppose the rule of the Japanese colonialists and achieved the victory in the protracted arduous struggle, opening the road of independence and socialism.
					
					 The general secretary of the New Yugoslavia Communist Party praised the President as the outstanding statesman in the 20th century who indicated the road to be followed by humankind with his rare idea and theories.
					
					 The chairman of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) noted that the President received boundless respect from the true revolutionaries of the world, adding that he will always live in their hearts.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Bangladesh said that the President, the father of socialist Korea, is an outstanding thinker and theoretician and peerless great man, adding that the revolutionary feats he performed before humankind will shine for all ages.

articles.title: Russian Military Orchestra Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Russian Military Orchestra Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The Central Military Orchestra of the Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation led by Chief Conductor Valery Khalilov, head of the military orchestra service of the Armed Forces of Russia, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Being briefed on the immortal story associated with the old home in Mangyongdae, the guests looked round the historic relics preserved with much care. 
					
					 Meanwhile, members of the central military orchestra visited the Songdowon International Children's Camp on Tuesday. 
					
					 They laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the camp and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 They gave a peculiar performance for the campers at the international friendship children's hall. 
					
					 The chief conductor wrote in the visitor's book that the Songdowon International Children's Camp is a fairy tale-like house for children. 
					
					 The central military orchestra also visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery, Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory and other places.

articles.title: Women's Union Officials Make Study Tour of Mt. Paektu Area
articles.content:
Women's Union Officials Make Study Tour of Mt. Paektu Area
 Samjiyon, July 1 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea made a study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu from June 23 to July 1. 
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung in the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo, the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site and Chongbong Bivouac and the mosaic depicting the three commanders of Mt. Paektu in the Paektusan Secret Camp and paid tribute. 
					
					 At the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site the visitors deeply grasped the outstanding military warfare and stratagem of Kim Il Sung who instilled the dawn of national liberation into the minds of the people. 
					
					 They also visited the Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site, Chongbong Bivouac and Konchang Bivouac via the Spring Site in Poso-ri and the Tableland of Junghung.
					
					 They were deeply moved to visit the township of Samjiyon which has been remodeled beyond recognition. 
					
					 They climbed Mt. Paektu and renewed their will to glorify forever the undying exploits of the peerless great persons and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 After visiting the Paektusan Secret Camp, sacred land of the revolution, they held an oath-taking meeting in front of leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the camp.
					
					 At the end of the meeting they looked round the historic relics preserved in the old home with much care, being briefed on the fact that Kim Jong Il grew up, hearing gun report of the great anti-Japanese war. 
					
					 During the study tour they held colorful political and cultural events including anti-Japanese guerrilla-style information and agitation contest and question-and-answer study contest.

articles.title: Scientific Successes Made in DPRK
articles.content:
Scientific Successes Made in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Chaek University of Technology in the DPRK has recently made scientific achievements of economic value.
					 The achievements include resistivity CT and other high-tech prospecting apparatuses and their interpreters, which are now paying off in practice.
					
					 With the help of those scientific achievements, the Kangdong Area Coal-mining Complex found out coal deposits of tens of thousands of tons in a district, which had been regarded as an area of no coal deposit from the geological point of view. 
					
					 Similar results were made in coal mines in the northern part of North Phyongan Province.
					
					 Meanwhile, some economic units found out geothermal water with the help of resistivity CT prospecting apparatus and the three-dimensional topographic map was introduced to the project for building stockbreeding base in Sepho area, thus economizing labor power and materials.

articles.title: Home-made Football Popular among DPRK People
articles.content:
Home-made Football Popular among DPRK People
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- "Choeusu (ace)"-trademarked football, made in the DPRK, is gaining popularity among local sports persons and fans.
					 This football is produced at a unit under the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports.
					
					 In this regard KCNA had an interview with Choe Jong Chun, chief of the football production unit.
					
					 Choe said:
					
					 The trademark "Choeusu" reflects our hope that the users of our products will become best players.
					
					 At present the demand for athletic apparatuses is growing among the people with strong enthusiasm for sports. To meet this demand, my unit has turned out quality footballs and other sports goods for juvenile sports schools across the country.
					
					 The football 450g in weight, produced at my unit, won a high appreciation from experts and users.
					
					 Ri Chol Hak, a student of the Sosong District Juvenile Sports School in Pyongyang, told KCNA: I have used "Choeusu"-trademarked football since March, and it is as good as imported one in quality. I will get intent on training to become a best footballer as demanded by the trademark.
					
					 The unit also produces volleyballs and uniforms and nets for various ball games.

articles.title: US Crime to Conduct Nuclear War Disclosed
articles.content:
US Crime to Conduct Nuclear War Disclosed
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The United States not only provoked the 1950-1953 Korean War but also sought to develop it into a world nuclear war.
					 In this regard, Prof. and Dr. Ri Yong Hwan, who is a candidate academician and a researcher of the History Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences in the DPRK, told KCNA: 
					
					 The June 25 detailed report, released by the Panmunjom mission of the Korean People's Army, referred to the fact that the U.S. imperialists had threatened the Korean nation with nukes since the war.
					
					 From the start of the Korean War, the U.S. imperialists blackmailed the DPRK and its neighbors with nukes and worked out a detailed plan for carrying their nuclear threat into action.
					
					 This scheme was clearly proven in a diary of George E. Stratemeyer, the then commander of the U.S. Air Forces in the Far East, south Korea's Yonhap News and other media recently disclosed.
					
					 According to the diary, an operational office of the Department of the U.S. Army began in September 1950 to examine the tactical use of A-bombs in close-support operation. In December that year, Dr. Ellis Johns of the office was dispatched to the Korean Front to study the nuclear use in action.
					
					 U.S. President Truman told reporters in November 1950 that the U.S. had always kept the using of A-bomb under review, while MacArthur, commander of the U.S. forces in the Far East, declared in December that they would drop 30 to 50 A-bombs in Korea-China border area.
					
					 Declassified documents of the U.S. Army show that the U.S. nuclear weapon was deployed in the Korean Front in mid-August 1950 for the first time.
					
					 All the facts go to prove that the U.S. is an enemy of the Korean nation and the global peace as it directly spawned the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula from 60-odd years ago.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Doing Proper Act for Ensuring Peace on Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Doing Proper Act for Ensuring Peace on Peninsula
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Anyone who truly wants the peace and security on the Korean peninsula should clearly understand the essence of the issue and do proper act, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Experts of some countries in the international issues are claiming that the situation on the Korean peninsula is tense due to the DPRK's nukes. This is little different from the brigandish assertion made by the U.S. as it is a profound confusing of right and wrong.
					
					 The peace does not settle on the peninsula 61 years since the ceasefire in Korea and the danger of a nuclear war is increasing there entirely because the U.S. is pursuing its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The denuclearization of the peninsula is the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and it is the policy task which should be certainly realized by the DPRK.
					
					 This can be achieved only when the U.S. gives up the hostile policy toward the DPRK and nuclear threat posed to it from outside is totally terminated.
					
					 The situation prevailing on the peninsula is so tense that a nuclear war may break out any moment due to the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK. Therefore, it is self-evident that the DPRK cannot abandon nukes, the powerful physical strength capable of deterring a nuclear war.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrence is not any political and economic bargaining chip but a powerful treasure sword to defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation.
					
					 Explicitly speaking once again, the U.S. should give up its hostile policy toward the DPRK and stop nuclear threat to it. This is the basic way of denuclearizing the Korean peninsula and ensuring peace there.

articles.title: Anti-"Government" Actions Staged in Seoul
articles.content:
Anti-"Government" Actions Staged in Seoul
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- More than 10 000 workers under the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a rally at Chonggye Square in Seoul on June 28 demanding the punishment of the chief culprit of the ferry Sewol disaster, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News. 
					 Sin Sung Chol, chairman of the KCTU, in his speech at the rally stressed the need to always remember the disaster of the ferry Sewol saying that the tears of the bereaved families and all the workers should not be in vain. 
					
					 He called upon all 800,000 members of the KCTU to take part in the 10 million signature campaign in demand of the enactment of a special law for probing the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster. 
					
					 He called for bringing a political strike of the KCTU to a success on July 22. 
					
					 Then followed a meeting on the situation in protest against the total opening of rice market and in demand of halt to denationalization and basic right to work. 
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants staged a demo. 
					
					 The riot police ran amuck to suppress demonstrators, firing water-cannon at them. The police took away at least 20 protesters. 
					
					 Prior to the rally of the KCTU, a meeting of the south Korean Federation of Peasants Associations took place at Chonggye Square in protest against the authorities' moves to open rice market. 
					
					 The Government Employees' Union, the Health Workers' Union and Railways Workers' Union, the Public Transport Workers' Union and other unions under the KCTU held meetings in different parts of Seoul in protest against the unpopular rule of the present regime.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included round-table talks, book exhibition and film show in Iran, reading session in Guinea and film show in Algeria on June 24 and 25.
					
					 Displayed in the front walls of the venues of the events were portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also on display in the venues were works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Kimilsungia" and "Korea Today".

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Indonesian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Indonesian Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung is a great master of ideology, theory and leadership as he performed the extraordinary ideological and theoretical exploits and leadership exploits in realizing the human cause of independence.
					 Nurdin Purnomo, chairman of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia, said this in a statement on June 24 issued on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of the President.
					
					 He continued:
					
					 The President is boundlessly revered by not only the Korean people but many progressives in the world including the Indonesian people 20 years since he passed away.
					
					 Though decades have passed, the Indonesian people are always remembering the significant days when the President visited Indonesia.
					
					 His august name will always be kept in the hearts of the Indonesian people with Kimilsungias in full bloom.
					
					 I am convinced that the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people will make the country built by the President more rich and powerful and surely achieve the national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, under the outstanding leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Introduced by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Introduced by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups between June 3 and 19, accompanied with photos of leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Russian paper Nakhodkinski Rabochi said in an article titled "Party and army form an integral whole" that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into a powerful guiding force for the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 The article noted that he put forward the Korean People's Army as the main force of the socialist cause and led it to successfully discharge its mission and role as the standard-bearer of the Songun revolution while making a long ceaseless journey of Songun.
					
					 The Russian paper Nidjegorodskaya Pravda in articles titled "Kim Jong Il, outstanding statesman" and "Brilliant commander in era of Songun" said that he always won victories in the showdown with the U.S. with his matchless courage and pluck, iron faith and will and superb military stratagem.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Blits carried an article titled "Single-minded unity in DPRK and Kim Jong Il". The article said the single-minded unity in the DPRK had been firmly cemented since he started the work at the C.C., the WPK. It went on:
					
					 He put the single-minded unity of the whole society on the highest level. The history of his leadership over the party is one of a genuine statesman for the people.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Bangla Times and the Indonesian paper Suara Karya praised the feats he performed in building and leading the party.

articles.title: Romanian Political Party Leader Supports Korean People's Struggle
articles.content:
Romanian Political Party Leader Supports Korean People's Struggle
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- I am convinced that the heroic Korean people will always win victory in the standoff with U.S. imperialism.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said this in a statement posted on its website "Juche Idea" on June 24. 
					
					 Noting that on June 25, 1950, the U.S. ignited a war against the young DPRK, the statement went on:
					
					 At that time the U.S. mobilized armed forces of south Korea and its satellite states and made desperate efforts to stifle the DPRK in its cradle. But it could not match the outstanding war methods, military strategy and tactics of President Kim Il Sung and the indomitable strength of the Korean people united close around the leader. 
					
					 The Korean people won the great victory in the three year-long bloody war and July 27 was recorded in the history of the DPRK as the day of war victory when it defeated the U.S.
					
					 Though six decades have passed since the ceasefire, peace does not settled on the Korean peninsula and the situation there is so tense that a war may break out any time due to the repeated moves of the U.S. and its followers to unleash a new war. 
					
					 The U.S. is continuing to ship huge nuclear war equipment into the vicinities of the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 This goes to clearly prove that it is none other than the U.S. and the south Korean authorities following it who are disturbing peace on the peninsula. 
					
					 The Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania bitterly denounces the moves of the U.S. and south Korean authorities to unleash a new war and strongly demand the U.S. immediately withdraw all its armed forces for aggression from south Korea.

articles.title: 50th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Celebrated Worldwide
articles.content:
50th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Celebrated Worldwide
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Progressive political parties and people all over the world significantly celebrated the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) which fell on June 19.
					 On this occasion the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea presented gifts to Kim Jong Il while the president of the Workers' Party of Peru presented a gift to Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Brazilian Communist Party, the president of the Socialist Party of Benin, the general secretary of the Patriotic Movement for National Salvation of Chad and the chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association sent floral baskets and bouquets to DPRK missions in their countries while a delegation of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar and public figures of various countries paid congratulatory visits to DPRK missions.
					
					 Personages of political and public circles and organizations of various countries issued statements. They included the secretary general of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, the honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, a vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt, the chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il, the chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea and the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association.
					
					 Kimjongilia exhibitions, book, photo and fine art exhibitions, seminars and other colorful political and cultural events took place with splendor in China, Mongolia, Mexico, Benin, the UK and other countries, 350 times in all.
					
					 Meanwhile, foreign mass media gave wide publicity to the sacred career of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They said that June 19, 1964 was a significant day when a new milestone of changes was provided in the development of the WPK and the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche and Kim Jong Il led the party and revolution to victory with his matchless political caliber.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Kuwait
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Kuwait
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- A Kuwaiti committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated on June 19.
					 Javid Ahmad, chairman of the Kuwait Asian Journalist Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to positively introduce the revolutionary career of the President and his exploits and hold political and cultural events including seminar and film show between June 19 and July 20.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Tunisia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Tunisia
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- A Tunisian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Tunis on June 23.
					 Jalilla el Fersi, secretary general of the Tunisia-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career of the President and his exploits on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated by the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on June 26.
					 Alexandr Gromov, first secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the party, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events including a meeting to praise the revolutionary career of the President and his exploits on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Kyrgyzstan
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was formed by the United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan on June 24.
					 Pak Kyong Ho, chairman of the confederation, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful events including a floral basket-laying ceremony, remembrance meeting and photo exhibition on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Uzbekistan
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was formed by the "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan on June 27. 
					 Ju Yong Il, chairman of the association, was elected chairman of the committee. 
					
					 It decided to hold events praising the undying revolutionary career and exploits of the President on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: US Strength Is Not Almighty: Indonesian Paper
articles.content:
US Strength Is Not Almighty: Indonesian Paper
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The Indonesian newspaper Siputar Indonesia on June 20 carried an article titled "Lesson in Korean War" on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of the anti-U.S. joint struggle. 
					 The article said:
					
					 The Korean war was a war of aggression ignited by the U.S. to stifle the young DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK had young regular armed forces and defense industry at that time.
					
					 On the contrary, the U.S. introduced very huge armed forces in and around the Korean peninsula before igniting the war. 
					
					 However, the superiority of military technology of the U.S. which boasted of its "mightiness" could not match the army and people of the DPRK who rose up as one, bearing in minds the justice of their cause.
					
					 The U.S., which blustered that it was not defeated even once in the war history, was compelled to sign the Armistice Agreement like the surrender document in three years since it unleashed the Korean war.
					
					 After the war the U.S. has kicked off rackets for a new war for several decades, far from drawing a lesson from the defeat it suffered in the Korean war.
					
					 The DPRK has strengthened self-defence capabilities in every way in the standoff with the U.S. for several decades since the ceasefire and it has access to nuclear deterrence for self-defence to cope with the extreme nuclear threats from the U.S. 
					
					 The U.S. strength is by no means almighty. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website on June 17 an article exposing the true colors of the U.S. as the provoker of the Korean war.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by British Organization
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "On Our People's Struggle for Socialist Construction and National Reunification" was posted by the Britain-Korea Friendship Association on its website on June 24.
					 The work, published on June 24, Juche 77 (1988), clarifies the idea on the struggle of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people to win the complete victory of socialism in the northern half of the Republic and reunify the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad de defensa del islote Hwa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad de defensa del islote Hwa
Pyongyang, 1 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la unidad de defensa del islote Hwa, situado en el Mar Este de Corea.
					Primero, el Mariscal recorrio el monumento en memoria de visita de orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il hecha en octubre de 1999.
					
					El Mariscal senalo que el Presidente Kim Il Sung habia dado en decenas de ocasiones las valiosas instrucciones referidas a esa unidad de defensa y el Dirigente tambien le presto profunda atencion. Agrego que hay que glorificar las proezas del Presidente y el Dirigente al perfeccionar los preparativos de combate y lograr exitos en la intensificacion de combatividad.
					
					Al presenciar el bosque del islote y los arboles frutales de diversas especies plantados alrededor del cuartel de la unidad, dijo muy satisfecho que seria mejor llamar el islote como el de pinos y evaluo alto el hecho de que la unidad realizo la reforestacion  y la creacion de frutales segun el proposito del partido.
					
					El Comandante Supremo subio al puesto de vigilancia, en donde vio en detalles el documento del plan de defensa de la unidad y escucho de los comandantes el parte del deber de combate de la unidad de defensa.
					
					Hay que eliminar cabalmente en el mar a los enemigos que arremetan desde el mar, subrayo y presento nuevos y originales metodos de combate que surgen en la preparacion perfecta de combate del islote Hwa como la distribucion de los medios de artilleria y el uso de la posicion de fuego conforme a la demanda de la guerra moderna.
					
					El islote Hwa es la base avanzada de la zona de defensa de la gran unidad combinada 324 del EPC y la vanguardia del Mar Este de Corea conectada con el patio del Comite Central del PTC, apunto y recalco que la mision importante de la unidad de defensa es convertir el islote en la fortaleza inconquistable y el Wolmi de hoy.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de intensificar la labor politica e ideologica entre los uniformados para formarlos como personas indoblegables y de consolidar la combatividad al acostumbrarse en el entrenamiento, de modo que si estalla la guerra, los uniformados de la unidad de defensa aniquilen a todos los enemigos en el mar.
					
					El Comandante Supremo dio a la unidad de defensa la orden inesperada de realizar el disparo artillero y dirigio el entrenamiento de fuego.
					
					Mirando con binoculo los movimientos de manejo de canones de los militares dio la orden de disparo.
					
					Los artilleros acertaron todos los blancos.
					
					El Comandante Supremo elogio a los artilleros como los famosos diciendo que el jefe de la unidad de defensa mando magnificamente el disparo artillero.
					
					Puesto que los artilleros de la unidad se entregaron en el entrenamiento guardando en lo profundo del corazon la demanda del Partido de impulsar el movimiento de ser artilleros famosos, pudieron acertar todos los blancos,  asevero y denomino la quinta compania, que realizo el disparo artillero, como "compania de artilleros famosos" y le dio el agradecimiento del Comandante Supremo del EPC.
					
					Dando recorrido por el cuartel, la sala de educacion, la de bano, el comedor y los depositos de la tercera compania de la unidad de defensa, se entero de las condiciones de vida de los militares.
					
					Y dijo que es bueno que la unidad suministra diariamente a cada soldado las comidas de soya de 360 gramos y en todos los comedores huelen a pescados y crian muchos animales domesticos tales como puercos, patos, gansos para hacer abundante la mesa de comida.
					
					Agrego que las companias de la unidad de defensa, en que estan preparados buenas condiciones de comida y vida son iguales a   la anorada casa natal de los soldados y la unidad de defensa a la aldea natal de ellos.
					
					Subrayo que igual a la unidad de defensa del islote Ryo, en la unidad de defensa del islote Hwa tambien se materializa mas correctamente la politica militar del Partido y destaco la necesidad de entregarse a la ganaderia, la pesca y el cultivo de soya para convertirla en la unidad orgullosa y rica.
					
					El Mariscal al manifestar la conviccion de que los militares de la unidad de defensa del islote Hwa apoyaran con fidelidad la direccion revolucionaria del Songun del Partido, dono a la tercera compania el binoculo y el fusil automatico como recuerdo y se fotografio junto a los militares de la unidad y sus familiares.
					
					Ese dia el Mariscal fue acompanado por el vicemariscal del EPC, Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Jong Chon, subjefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC.

articles.title: Funcionarias e integrantes de UMDC recorren lugares de batalla revolucionaria del monte Paektu
articles.content:
Funcionarias e integrantes de UMDC recorren lugares de batalla revolucionaria del monte Paektu
Samjiyon, 1 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del 23 de junio al primero de julio el recorrido de las funcionarias e integrantes de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea por los lugares de batalla revolucionaria de la zona del monte Paektu.
					Las caravanistas depositaron cestos y ramos de flores ante la estatua de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung, erguida en el Monumento a la Victoria en la Batalla de Pochonbo el lugar de batalla revolucionaria de Pochonbo y el campamento de Chongbong y ante el mural mosaico con las imagenes de los tres Generales del monte Paektu levantado en el campamento secreto del mismo monte y les rindieron homenaje.
					
					En Pochonbo ellas asimilaron el metodo y la estrategia militar del Presidente quien inspiro al pueblo coreano la esperanza de la liberacion de la patria.
					
					Llegaron por via del manantial de Posori y la meseta Junghung al lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Rimyongsu y los campamentos de Chongbong y Konchang.
					
					La visita a la renovada cabecera distrital de Samjiyon dejo impresion indeleble en las visitantes.
					
					En el monte Paektu, redoblaron la voluntad de eternizar las inmortales hazanas de los grandes hombres y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche siguiendo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Luego de visitar el campamento secreto del monte Paektu, lugar sagrado de la revolucion, organizaron un acto de juramento ante la casa natal del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Terminado el acto, ellas recorrieron los objetos historicos conservados en esa casa escuchando explicaciones sobre el hecho de que el Dirigente crecio oyendo detonaciones de la lucha armada antijaponesa.
					
					Durante el recorrido, desarrollaron el concurso de propaganda y agitacion a la manera de la guerrilla antijaponesa, el de estudio con preguntas y respuestas y otras labores politicas y culturales.

articles.title: EE.UU. debe abandonar su politica hostil anti-RPDC, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
EE.UU. debe abandonar su politica hostil anti-RPDC, insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 1 de julio (ACNC) -- Quienes desean de veras la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana deben ver correctamente la esencia del problema y portarse bien.
					Asi inicia el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual y continua:
					
					Los especialistas en asuntos internacionales de algunos paises hablan como si la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana fuera tensa debido a las armas nucleares de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, lo que es una teoria tan bandidesca como la insistencia de Estados Unidos.
					
					Hasta la fecha en que se cumpliran 61 anos del cese de fuego de la guerra coreana, no reina la paz en la Peninsula Coreana debido a la anacronica y obstinada politica hostil de EE.UU. contra la RPDC.
					
					La desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana es el legado de los Generalisimo Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y la tarea politica a ser materializada estrictamente por la RPDC.
					
					Sera realizada solo cuando EE.UU. abandone su politica hostil anti-RPDC y sera liquidada totalmente la amenaza nuclear del exterior a la RPDC.
					
					Hoy dia, en la Peninsula Coreana esta creada una situacion tan peligrosa como nadie sabe cuando estallaria la guerra nuclear, debido a las maniobras de EE.UU. destinadas a aplastar la RPDC.
					
					Bajo tal condicion, es natural que la RPDC no abandone la fuerza fisica, o sea, las armas nucleares capaces de prevenir la guerra nuclear.
					
					Las fuerzas disuasivas nucleares de la RPDC no son regateo politico ni mercancia economica sino un medio omnipotente para defender la soberania del pais y la dignidad de la nacion.
					
					En renunciar EE.UU. su politica hostil y cesar su amenaza nuclear contra la RPDC, reside el metodo fundamental para realizar la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la preservacion de la paz.
